document.full_text: mark teixeira and nick swisher supplied the power, and three relievers shut down the angels as the yankees won six of their final seven on the trip.
document.title: yankees 5, angels 3: with pitching and power, yankees pass a road test
lines_and_colors: mark teixeira and nick swisher supplied the power, and three relievers shut down the angels as the yankees won six of their final seven on the trip.
